Package edu.ncsu.csc.CoffeeMaker.controllers

Class APIUserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.CoffeeMaker.controllers.APIController
      • edu.ncsu.csc.CoffeeMaker.controllers.APIUserController
  • @RestController
public class APIUserController
extends APIController
    Class to handle Rest API calls dealing with the User class. To be used by the HTML pages Spring will automatically convert all of the ResponseEntity and List results to JSON
    Author:
    Audrey Si (fasi)

      REST API method to provide POST access to the User model.

      REST API method to allow deleting a User from the CoffeeMaker's Inventory, by making a DELETE request to the API endpoint and indicating the User to delete (as a path variable)

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        @GetMapping("/api/v1//users/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getUser​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                       java.lang.String id)
        REST API method to provide GET access to all users in the system
        Parameters:
        id - represents the user ID / username used to find a user from the database
        Returns:
        JSON representation of the found user or error message if none is found

      • createUser

        @PostMapping("/api/v1//users")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createUser​(@RequestBody
                                                          User user)
        REST API method to provide POST access to the User model. This is used to create a new User by automatically converting the JSON RequestBody provided to a User object. Invalid JSON will fail.
        Parameters:
        user - The valid User to be saved.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity indicating success if the User could be saved to the CoffeeMaker system, or an error if it could not be

      • login

        @GetMapping("/api/v1//users")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity login​(@RequestBody
                                                     User user)
        Method used to login to a new user in the system. Return error message if there are errors during the login process
        Parameters:
        user - represents user to search for in the CoffeeMaker system
        Returns:
        User object with 200 status if successful login or an error response (400) if not

      • deleteUser

        @DeleteMapping("/api/v1//users/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteUser​(@PathVariable
                                                          java.lang.String id)
        REST API method to allow deleting a User from the CoffeeMaker's Inventory, by making a DELETE request to the API endpoint and indicating the User to delete (as a path variable)
        Parameters:
        id - The username of the User to delete
        Returns:
        Success if the User could be deleted; an error if the User does not exist
